articles.title: It’s Time To Say Goodbye To Call Of Duty: Modern Warfare - GameSpot
articles.description: Call Of Duty: Black Ops Cold War is probably going to nuke the Warzone map and put a final end to the era of Modern Warfare while forcing some players to choose which game to fit on their hard drive.
articles.content: Call Of Duty: Modern Warfare 2019 had a massive impact on the Call Of Duty formula by delivering a mil-sim-inspired game. Large maps, a thoughtful attachment system, and the inclusion of vehicles att… [+983 chars]
